title: DaRT API response
description: Schema defining the data returned by the DaRT API

caseStatus.description: The processing state for the case

caseType.description: The internal code for a type of case

caseProcedure.description: The type of procedure for the case

allocationLevel.description: A case level used for allocation purposes

allocationBand.description: A band used for allocation purposes

caseSpecialisms.description: A list of case specialisms for allocation purposes

caseSubmittedDate.description: The date the case was submitted by the appellant

caseCreatedDate.description: The date the case was received

caseUpdatedDate.description: The date the case was last updated in the back-office

caseValidDate.description: The date since when the case was considered valid

caseValidationDate.description: The date the case was validated in the back-office

caseValidationOutcome.description: The outcome of the validation action

examples: Appeal has not been submitted on time
Documents have not been submitted on time
caseValidationInvalidDetails.description: A list of reasons why the appeal is invalid
caseValidationInvalidDetails.$comment: The list will contain items only if the caseValidationOutcome is invalid

examples: Appellant name is not the same on the application form and appeal form
caseValidationIncompleteDetails.description: A list of reasons why the appeal is incomplete
caseValidationIncompleteDetails.$comment: The list will contain items only if the caseValidationOutcome is incomplete

caseExtensionDate.description: When the validation outcome is incomplete, an extension may be granted to provide missing information

caseStartedDate.description: A date indicating when the case was started, resulting in the creation of a timetable

casePublishedDate.description: A date indicating when the case was published

linkedCaseStatus.description: Indicates if the case is linked, and the type of relationship

leadCaseReference.description: The reference of the lead case, if the case is a child case

caseWithdrawnDate.description: The date the case was withdrawn by the appellant

caseTransferredDate.description: The date the case was transferred to a new case of a different type

transferredCaseClosedDate.description: The date the case was closed and the appellant requested to resubmit

caseDecisionOutcomeDate.description: The date of the case decision

caseDecisionPublishedDate.description: The date the case decision was published

caseDecisionOutcome.description: The final outcome for the decision

caseCompletedDate.description: The date the case decision letter

enforcementNotice.description: Indicates if an enforcement notice is the reason for the appeal

applicationReference.description: The unique identifier of the LPA application

applicationDate.description: The date of the original LPA application

applicationDecision.description: The outcome of the original LPA decision

lpaDecisionDate.description: The date of the original LPA decision

caseSubmissionDueDate.description: The statutory deadline for submitting an appeal from the original LPA decision date

siteAddressLine1.description: First line of case site address

siteAddressLine2.description: Second line of case site address

siteAddressTown.description: Town / City of the site address

siteAddressPostcode.description: Postal code of the site address

isCorrectAppealType.description: Indicates if the LPA considers the appeal type appropriate

examples: Replacement of an existing gate to access the property
originalDevelopmentDescription.description: The original description of the development, as provided by the appellant

changedDevelopmentDescription.description: Indicates that the LPA has changed the development description

newConditionDetails.description: Since the original application, a number of things have changed.

nearbyCaseReferences.description: A list of related case references known to the appellant and the LPA

neighbouringSiteAddressLine1.description: First line of address of the neighbouring site

neighbouringSiteAddressLine2.description: Second line of address of the neighbouring site

neighbouringSiteAddressTown.description: Town / City of the neighbouring site address

neighbouringSiteAddressCounty.description: County of the neighbouring site address

neighbouringSiteAddressPostcode.description: Postal code of the neighbouring site address

neighbouringSiteAddresses.description: A list of neighbouring site addresses

affectedListedBuildingNumbers.description: A list of affected listed building IDs from Historic England

appellantCostsAppliedFor.description: Indicates if the appellant has applied for costs

lpaCostsAppliedFor.description: Indicates if the LPA has applied for costs

inspectorName.description: Name of inspector allocated to case

caseOfficerName.description: name of case officer assigned to case
